Name: Hunting fields of Jackals
About the game: Discord: QQ group: 534994778 Jackals is not only a 3rd person vehicle shooter game, but also an off-road racing/battle royale concept and PVE element combined game. In Jackals(in short of Hunting fields of Jackals), players will drive modern military vehicles racing and fighting against other players and AIs.Only one player/team can win in a round, the winner could be either the first who reaches the final destination/checkpoint or the last man stand. Third party AI forces will join the battle with players, the forces consist with air and ground units, if players are willing to take the risk fighting with them, special items and powerful weapons can be retrieved as the trophy. modern war elements, players can also have the chance to control reconnaissance drones, airborne gunships, combat drones through special items that retrieved from PVE combats, also some powerful weapons like anti armor rocket launchers, shoulder mounted missile launchers and grenade launchers can be the combat changer. Choose right vehicles for each of game round is essential, vehicles vary in many respects, armor strength, speed and firepower, generally, these factors are against each other, becoming a sharpshooter might not be able to rule the game sufficiently, instead, planning smartly could be a better choice. Customize your vehicle, and choose wisely to fit your strategy and win a game. what's the special 1 The need for speed! in this game, shooting is not the only core game play element, vehicle driving is also important, if staying alive during combats is difficult for you, keep maneuver and avoid them! 2 Separated roles on one vehicle or team up and fight in a fleet! 2 Heavy weapons and modern vehicles that resemble every facet in the real world military power. 3 AI players and NPCs add uncertainties and tactical flexibility into the competition between players. 5 Classic military equipments and mordern warfare elements And more is await for you to discover and put the idea in.
